name: andross
description: Common interfaces and types for typescript.

scripts.doc-create: npx typedoc --mode file --name js-andross --readme README.md --out docs --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeNotExported --excludeProtected --ignoreCompilerErrors --theme minimal main.ts
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run transpile && npm run doc

author: Andre Wachsmuth
